result.execSummary:
The defendant Nicholas Allan Anderson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Concurrent with: 13CF236 - Count 2.
14CM195 - Count 1.
Current Minnesota sentence.
Not to have contact with:  Amber Ottosen.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Nicholas Allan Anderson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
CASES: 14CF360, 14CF269, 14CF18, 14CM195, 13CM113, 13CF236 Defendant Nicholas Allen Anderson in court with attorney Daniel P Repka.  Defendant Nicholas Allen Anderson in custody.  Malia Theresa Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   KJB- Clerk. 10:02AM 

13CF236: 
DA to file amended CC on 13CF236. 
Def plea of NC to Ct 2. CT accepts plea, finds G, enters JOC. Ct 1 prev dismissed, Ct 3 dismissed. 

14CF269: 
Def plea of G to Ct 1. CT accepts plea, finds G, enters JOC. 

14CM195:
Def plea of NC to Ct 1. CT accepts plea, finds G, enters JOC.

14CF18 is dismissed. 

14CF360 DRI. 

13CM113: State amend to County DOC 56.0, Def plea of G to County DOC 56.0, CT finds G, forfeiture of $114.50. 

SENTENCING:
9 mos on each misd, concurrent to one another and concurrent to MN sentence. 

13CF236: restitution of $1980.00 + 10% surcharge of $198.00 = $2,178.00. no contact w/Diana Brookman.

14CM195: restitution of $942.52 to Alco, $438.30 to Amery Express, $135.15 to Countryside Cooperative + 10% surcharge of  $151.60 = $1,667.57. No contact w/Countryside or Amery Express  

14CF269: no contact w/Amber Ottesen. 

9 Days sent credit. 

Wage assignment from prison wages of $100/mo split 50-50 between RST. No fines/cost. RST to be paid first out of wage assignment.

CASES: 14CM195, 14CF18, 14CF269, 14CF360, 13CM113, 13CF236 Defendant Nicholas Allan Anderson in court with attorney Daniel P Repka.  Defendant Nicholas Allan Anderson in custody.   Dan Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   KJB- Clerk. 8:46AM Warrants continue, bonds continue. 8:51am adj.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 6, 2015 at 09:00 am.

CASES: 14CF269, 14CF18, 14CM195, 13CF236 & 13CM113.  Attorney Ashley J. Morse in court.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 9:09 am.  AMorse-def incustody in Washington MN.  CT-All files (5) set for review in 30 days.  9:16 am adj.  Review scheduled for September 8, 2014 at 07:00 am.
